secondaryColor - Variable in class SierpinskiSpinner
The secondary color of the spinner.
secondaryColorStep - Variable in class SierpinskiSpinner
The change in the secondary color required at each level of recursion to generate a gradient-like effect in the image.
setCenterPoint(Point) - Method in class SierpinskiSpinner
 
setColorSteps() - Method in class SierpinskiSpinner
Computes the change in color required to move evenly from black (0, 0, 0) to the given colors in SierpinskiSpinner.drawingDepth steps.
setDepth(int) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel
Applies the specified recursion depth to the triangle stored in this panel.
setDepth(int) - Method in class SierpinskiSpinner
Sets the recursion depth and calls SierpinskiSpinner.setColorSteps().
setDrawCircles(boolean) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel
Sets whether or not inscribed circles should be drawn on the triangles.
setDrawTriangles(boolean) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel
Sets whether or not triangles should be drawn around the circles.
setFilled(boolean) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel
Sets the triangle to either be drawn filled or as wireframes.
setFilled(boolean) - Method in class SierpinskiSpinner
 
setPrimaryColor(Color) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel
Applies the specified primary color to all of the triangles stored in this panel.
setPrimaryColor(Color) - Method in class SierpinskiSpinner
 
setRadius(int) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel

setRotationOffset(double) - Method in class SierpinskiSpinner
 
setSecondaryColor(Color) - Method in class SierpinskiPanel

SierpinskiSpinner - Class in <Unnamed>
Represents a Sierpinski triangle fidget spinner, able to draw itself using a provided Graphics object.

sizeSlider - Variable in class SierpinskiApplication
Slider that specifies the radius of the spinners.
sPanel - Variable in class SierpinskiApplication
The SierpinskiPanel instance responsible for maintaining and computing the state of the spinner as well as drawing it.
spinner - Variable in class SierpinskiPanel
